content.sashadeath.betrayedPhantom.blurb: YOU DIED. Fallen on the battlefield, your soul began to rot. Between earth and the beyond, SOMETHING REACHED OUT. You took its bargain, and it took your body. NOW YOU ARE A SHADE, alive again but half-existent. Your second chance at life is denied you, and a wraith now wears your skin.
content.sashadeath.betrayedPhantom.incor: Can choose to pass through one of the following: Wood, natural stone, flesh.

content.sashadeath.betrayedPhantom.keeps: Placed on your corpse's eyes by some kind soul. You always know the location of the wraith wearing your skin.
content.sashadeath.betrayedPhantom.death: The funeral mask you were meant to wear. When donned, reduce the DR of all social rolls by 2 when communing with any undead.
content.sashadeath.betrayedPhantom.praye: Your mother wanted you to have it. You start with a Sacred Scroll.
content.sashadeath.betrayedPhantom.finge: Possibly belonged to a priest. No crypt, tomb, cemetery gate or catacomb can lock you out.
content.sashadeath.betrayedPhantom.tragi: You must deliver it to someone. Only then can you be reunited with your body.
content.sashadeath.betrayedPhantom.glass: Not yours. Place it in your skull to see through any illusion.
